blogPost.excerpt: We scrapped the Likes, feed, and spammy messages to finally bring aligned professionals together meaningfully. 600+ tech leaders meet regularly through hand-curated introductions and Office Hours over video to accelerate their progress.
blogPost.body: We scrapped the Likes, feed, and spammy messages to finally bring aligned professionals together meaningfully. 600+ tech leaders meet regularly through hand-curated introductions and Office Hours over video to accelerate their progress.
blogPost.title: Kinetic - Meet co-founders, mentors, advisors, investors, & customers
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 我们取消了点赞、馈赠和垃圾信息，终于把对齐的专业人士有意义地聚集在一起。600+技术领袖通过精心策划的介绍和视频办公时间定期会面，加速他们的进步。
localize.tagline: 与联合创始人、导师、顾问、投资人和客户见面。

localize.description: 我們取消了點贊、饋贈和垃圾信息，終於把對齊的專業人士有意義地聚集在一起。600+技術領袖通過精心策劃的介紹和視頻辦公時間定期會面，加速他們的進步。
localize.tagline: 與聯合創始人、導師、顧問、投資人和客戶見面。

previous.excerpt: Clubpad is a soundboard for your Clubhouse rooms 🔥 Show some love with applauses, drop the mic with a DJ horn, fill awkward silences with the jeopardy music, react to bad jokes with the rimshot, use the inception bwaaaaah to add drama, and other memes 📣
previous.title: clubpad - Reaction sounds for your Clubhouse rooms

localize.description: Clubpad是你的Clubhouse房间的声板 🔥用掌声来表达爱意，用DJ喇叭来丢掉麦克风，用危险音乐来填补尴尬的沉默，用Rimshot来回应不好的笑话，用inception bwaaaaah来增加戏剧性，以及其他备忘录📣。
Clubpad是你的Clubhouse房間的聲板 🔥用掌聲來表達愛意，用DJ喇叭來丟掉麥克風，用危險音樂來填補尷尬的沉默，用Rimshot來回應不好的笑話，用inception bwaaaaah來增加戲劇性，以及其他備忘錄📣。

next.excerpt: With the new Apple Silicon Macs, A lot of people want to know about compatibility for specific apps, however, with thousands of apps that can be run on Mac it can be difficult to know if the app you need is compatible before you buy an Apple Silicon Mac.
next.title: Apple Silicon App Test - Test your apps for compatibility before you buy an M1 Mac

localize.description: 随着新的苹果Silicon Mac的推出，很多人都想了解特定应用的兼容性，然而，由于Mac上可以运行的应用有数千种，因此在购买苹果Silicon Mac之前，很难知道你需要的应用是否兼容。
localize.tagline: 在购买M1 Mac之前，请测试您的应用程序的兼容性。

localize.description: 隨着新的蘋果Silicon Mac的推出，很多人都想了解特定應用的兼容性，然而，由於Mac上可以運行的應用有數千種，因此在購買蘋果Silicon Mac之前，很難知道你需要的應用是否兼容。
localize.tagline: 在購買M1 Mac之前，請測試您的應用程序的兼容性。
